items.question: Is Candle Master really free?
items.answer: Yes! The basic version is 100% free forever. You get 100 moves per game, 10 legendary stocks, and all 3 beautiful themes. No credit card required, no hidden fees.

items.question: What stocks are included?
items.answer: We have 300+ legendary stocks from around the world, with historical data spanning from 1980 to 2025. Free users can access 10 stocks, while PRO members unlock the full collection.

items.question: How is this different from paper trading?
items.answer: Candle Master uses 'blind trading' - you don't know which stock you're trading or what time period it's from. This eliminates hindsight bias and forces you to rely purely on chart reading skills.

items.question: Can I use it on desktop?
items.answer: Currently Candle Master is optimized for mobile as a Progressive Web App (PWA). Desktop version is coming soon! Sign up for our waitlist to be notified when it launches.

items.question: How do I cancel PRO subscription?
items.answer: You can cancel anytime from your app settings. No questions asked, no hassle. If you have the lifetime plan, there's nothing to cancel - you own it forever!
